meanings.sent1: The ivoried statue gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The antique dresser was ivoried to perfection.
meanings.sent3: The ivoried chess set looked elegant on the table.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as ivoried as the keys of a grand piano.
meanings.sent5: The ivoried frame added a touch of sophistication to the painting.

meanings.sent1: The ivoried handle of the knife felt smooth in his hand.
meanings.sent2: The ivoried carvings on the chair were expertly crafted.
meanings.sent3: She wore an ivoried necklace that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent4: The moon cast an ivoried glow over the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The ivoried keys of the piano looked almost real.

meanings.sent1: The ivoried walls of the room made it feel spacious.
meanings.sent2: The ivoried petals of the flower stood out in the garden.
meanings.sent3: His ivoried shirt was a bit too bright for the occasion.
meanings.sent4: The ivoried sky signaled the approaching storm.
meanings.sent5: The ivoried clouds drifted lazily across the sky.
